==Knowledge VS Wisdom==
  −   −
INFORMATION is a Pointer to KNOWLEDGE,KNOWLEDGE is a Pointer to WISDOM, WISDOM alone is your Key to TRUTH.
  −   −
DEFINITION:
  −   −
1). KNOWLEDGE: it is a Collection of the Accepted Views based on what you have Seen at the Gross level,Read and Heard,and this Lacks in Direct Understanding. With Knowledge there is always a factor of Doubt, Uncertainty, Speculation, Lack of Control and is lacking in the knowledge at the Foundation level due to this there is always a dependency on Tests & Trial and Errors involved.
  −   −
2). WISDOM: The deep understanding gained by Direct Perception at all Levels giving you the Ability to Control and Manipulate the Factors. With Wisdom there is no Factor of an Error. for Eg: Having Knowledge in Music is not enough to Comprehend the [[Absolute_pitch|Absolute]] and the [[Relative_Pitch|Relative Pitch]] in Music, Only through constant Application, Practice and Observation could that Wisdom be Gained.
  −   −
One of the Very best examples for someone with Mastery in Wisdom was [[Nikola_Tesla|TESLA]].
  −   −
Basic Differences between Knowledge and Wisdom are:
  −
** Knowledge is information gathered through external Sources and Resources, Wisdom is information Gained through Observation alone.
  −
** Knowledge is Generic, Wisdom is Unique.
  −
** Knowledge has it foundations in Ignorance & Darkness, Whereas Wisdom is rooted in Clarity and Light.
  −
** Knowledge Dwells in Uncertainty, Doubt, Indecision and Speculation at the foundation levels and its lacks a firm base, Wisdom has its base in Understanding,Perfectly established in Clarity,The Actions are Well Grounded and Firm at all levels.
  −
** Knowledge can be acquired from External Sources and Resources, Wisdom can only be acquired through Contemplation ,Meditation, Observation and is Purely Subjective.
  −
** Knowledge is Abundant, Wisdom is Scarce.
  −
** Knowledge CAN be shared, Wisdom CANNOT be shared.
  −   −
In todays world of the Fast and the Furious, Knowledge is all that we could find, It is absolutely lacking in Wisdom. Some of the Prominent Ancient MASTERs, who have shown us the path and the methods for getting Rooted in Wisdom are Buddha<ref name = "Sati">[http://www.tipitaka.org/stp-pali-eng-parallel Mahāsatipaṭṭhāna_Sutta], www.vri.dhamma.org</ref>,Patanjali<ref name = "Yoga">[http://www.sacred-texts.com/hin/yogasutr.htm Yoga Sutras], www.sacred-texts.com</ref>,Socrates <ref name = "Why_1">[http://www.sacred-texts.com/cla/plato/index.htm Dialogues of Plato], www.sacred-texts.com</ref> & Confucius <ref name = Why_2">[http://www.sacred-texts.com/cfu/conf2.htm THE GREAT LEARNING], www.sacred-texts.com</ref> and information related to thier methods can be found in the references beside them.
